pages.text: $(bold)Mending$() (Self-Repair) repairs your item using $(important)experience orbs$() you collect!$(br2)Each XP orb restores durability, keeping your precious tools in perfect condition.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(f)Ghast Tear$() grants $(bold)Mending +2$()$(br2)The tears of ghosts heal your tools!

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When you collect XP while holding a jeweled item:$(br)$(li)XP orbs repair the item instead of going to your XP bar$(li)Higher levels repair more per orb$(li)Works automatically$(li)Prioritizes damaged items$(br2)$(important)Stacks with Unbreaking$() for near-immortal tools!
